Check that the editor responses correctly to options being set. 

## Interactive


### Single line

```{webr-r}
print("test")
```


### Uncapped height


```{webr-r}
print("test")
59120
1 + 1
c(1, 3, 4)
print("line 5")
```


### Height cap

```{webr-r}
#| editor-max-height: 80
print("test")
59120
1 + 1
c(1, 3, 4)
print("line 5")
```
